title: Mena Suvari flashes sculpted midriff in futuristic chic silver dress at art exhibition opening
text:
Mena Suvari glowed as she posed up a storm at the Annenberg Space For Photography in LA this Thursday.

The 40-year-old American Beauty actress showed off her sculpted midriff at the event in a futuristic chic Brooke Da Cruz dress.

Her getup featured a half-sleeve at the left side and went off-the-shoulder at the right, hinting at but not revealing any cleavage.

Hello, gorgeous: Mena Suvari glowed as she posed up a storm at the Annenberg Space For Photography in LA this Thursday

Mena wound her blonde hair into a braid and accentuated her screen siren features with makeup including a slick of scarlet lipstick.

Her flowing split was were cut off above the ankle, and she rounded off the elegant ensemble with black ankle-strap Cult Of Coquette stilettos.

Another attendee at the event was 18-year-old Jade Pettyjohn, who rose to fame as a child star in An American Girl: McKenna Shoots For The Star in 2012.

Nadia Gray rocked a sleek black tie and white dress shirt with a dark blazer, emphasizing her slender legs in skintight checked trousers.

She slid into a pair of wine-colored heels that perfectly matched the red carpet as she posed up a storm for the shutterbugs.

The trio of actresses were at the swank venue for the opening of an exhibition called Walls: Defend, Divide And The Divine.

According to the Annenberg Space For Photography website, the exhibition assembles 70 people's work in a meditation on barriers.

The exhibition takes a historical perspective on civilizations and is split into six categories, five of which happen to begin with the letter D.

Delineation, Defense, Deterrent, The Divine, and Decoration are joined by The Invisible in the new exhibition.
